description: Number of certain rooted planar maps.
references: W. G. Brown, Enumeration of non-separable planar maps, Canad. J. Math., 15 (1963), 526-545.
formula: a(n)=4(7n-11)(3n-5)!/[(n-2)!(2n-1)! ]. - Emeric Deutsch, Mar 03 2004G.f.: 2*(g+1)/(1-g)^3 where g*(1-g)^2 = x. - Mark van Hoeij, Nov 10 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
